vlive.korean: [우승 조건] 야 정국이 1등 세 번 했는데? [According to the rule] Jung Kook won 3 times. 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.107
vlive.english: [According to the rule] Jung Kook won 3 times.

vlive.korean: 근데 이게, 조건이 있어요 - 뭐야? But it has conditions. - What? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [GOING SEVENTEEN 2020] EP.19 논리나잇 Ⅱ #2 (Debate Night Ⅱ #2)
우리가 하는 조건 하에 말씀하신 건가? - 네, 저희 조건... 저희라는 조건... Are you saying that because it's us? - Yes. Because it's us. 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 수빈&휴닝카이 : 뚝딱뚝딱 공작시간
vlive.english: Are you saying that because it's us? - Yes. Because it's us.

vlive.korean: 죄송합니다 - 아 이거 입장 조건이에요 죄송한데... I'm sorry. - I'm sorry but it's a dress code for this party. 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 😒 남친이 여사친을 애칭으로 부른다면?? [오늘부터 찐한 사이] EP07 #오찐사 #필굿
vlive.english: I'm sorry. - I'm sorry but it's a dress code for this party.

vlive.korean: 그래? 조건이 마음에 안 든대? Whynot? Does she not like the conditions? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 연락 두절된 남친이 다른 여자랑 있었다 [엑스엑스(XX)] - EP.01
vlive.english: Whynot? Does she not like the conditions?

examples.korean: Nobody would assent to the terms they proposed. 발음듣기 그들이 제안한 조건에 찬성할 사람은 아무도 없을 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Nobody would assent to the terms they proposed. 발음

examples.korean: the difference between inborn and conditioned reflexes 발음듣기 선천적 반응과 조건 반사 사이의 차이 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the difference between inborn and conditioned reflexes 발음

examples.korean: They met to finalize the terms of the treaty. 발음듣기 그들은 조약의 조건을 마무리짓기 위해 만났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They met to finalize the terms of the treaty. 발음

examples.korean: With so many ifs and buts, it is easier to wait and see. 발음듣기 조건과 이의들이 너무 많아서 기다려 보는 것이 더 수월하겠다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: With so many ifs and buts, it is easier to wait and see. 발음

examples.korean: A ceasefire is an essential precondition for negotiation. 발음듣기 휴전이 협상에 필수적인 전제 조건이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A ceasefire is an essential precondition for negotiation. 발음
